description:
Add a REST API to the News-Topic-Monitor application to expose trending topics and news data for external consumption.

CONTEXT:
This app monitors news sources and identifies trending topics. I want to integrate it with a separate LinkedIn Article Series Manager so I can pull timely topic suggestions when planning content.

API ENDPOINTS TO IMPLEMENT:

1. GET /api/topics/trending
Returns currently trending topics based on recent activity.

Query parameters:
- timeframe: "24h" | "7d" | "30d" (default: "7d")
- limit: number (default: 10)
- min_mentions: number (default: 3)

Response:
{
  "topics": [
    {
      "topic": "NIS2 compliance",
      "mention_count": 47,
      "trend_direction": "up" | "down" | "stable",
      "trend_percentage": 35.5,
      "tags": ["regulation", "EU", "cybersecurity"],
      "first_seen": "2025-01-15T10:30:00Z",
      "last_seen": "2025-01-31T14:22:00Z",
      "related_topics": ["DORA", "Critical Infrastructure"]
    }
  ],
  "generated_at": "2025-01-31T15:00:00Z"
}

2. GET /api/topics/search
Search for specific topics by keyword or tag.

Query parameters:
- q: search query string
- tag: filter by tag
- limit: number (default: 20)

Response: (same structure as /trending)

3. GET /api/topics/{topic_id}
Get detailed information about a specific topic.

Response:
{
  "topic": "NIS2 compliance",
  "mention_count": 47,
  "tags": ["regulation", "EU", "cybersecurity"],
  "timeline": [
    {"date": "2025-01-15", "mentions": 5},
    {"date": "2025-01-22", "mentions": 12},
    {"date": "2025-01-29", "mentions": 30}
  ],
  "sources": [
    {
      "title": "New NIS2 Guidelines Released",
      "url": "https://example.com/article",
      "published_at": "2025-01-29T09:00:00Z",
      "excerpt": "The European Commission published..."
    }
  ],
  "related_topics": [
    {"topic": "DORA", "relevance": 0.85},
    {"topic": "Critical Infrastructure", "relevance": 0.72}
  ]
}

4. GET /api/topics/by-tag/{tag}
Get all topics associated with a specific tag.

Response: (same structure as /trending)

5. GET /api/export/weekly-summary
Export last week's trending topics as structured data.

Response:
{
  "week_starting": "2025-01-27",
  "week_ending": "2025-01-31",
  "top_topics": [...],
  "emerging_topics": [...],  // new topics that weren't tracked before
  "declining_topics": [...]  // topics that dropped off
}

TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS:
- RESTful design with JSON responses
- CORS enabled (for potential web dashboard later)
- Optional API key authentication (environment variable)
- Rate limiting: 100 requests/hour per client
- Caching for expensive queries (5-minute TTL on trending)

INTEGRATION USE CASE:
The Article Series Manager will call these endpoints to:
- Weekly: Pull trending topics and suggest article ideas
- On-demand: Search for topics when brainstorming
- Planning: Get detailed sources when researching an article

Start with endpoints 1-3 as MVP. The export and tag endpoints can be added later.
